attributes.action: Require all MPs and Lords to take regular, but random, mandatory drugs tests.
attributes.background: As is the case with many of those who serve our country, it should become law that all representatives in the House of Commons and House of Lords should be subject to regular, but random, mandatory drugs tests.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105070

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
